abstract: A business software company founded by two former Facebook executives has raised money from some of the same investors who backed the social networking site, VentureBeat reported.
snippet: A business software company founded by two former Facebook executives has raised money from some of the same investors who backed the social networking site, VentureBeat reported.
lead_paragraph: A company founded by two former Facebook executives has raised money from some of the same investors who backed the social networking site, VentureBeat reported.

headline.main: Firm of Ex-Facebook Execs Said to Raise Funds
